statements: SELECT * FROM locations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, name FROM locations WHERE latitude > 10.5;
SELECT name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE latitude < 0;
SELECT * FROM locations ORDER BY longitude DESC;
SELECT id, name, latitude, longitude FROM locations ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -100;
SELECT name FROM locations WHERE latitude BETWEEN 30 AND 50 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name FROM locations WHERE longitude IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE name LIKE '%New%' OR name LIKE '%York%';
SELECT * FROM location_data;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM location_data;
SELECT location_name, recommendation_type FROM location_data JOIN recommendation ON location_data.location_id = recommendation.location_id;
SELECT location_data.location_name, recommendation.recommendation_description FROM location_data JOIN recommendation ON location_data.location_id = recommendation.location_id;
SELECT * FROM location_data WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM location_data WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM recommendation WHERE recommendation_type = 'Food' ORDER BY recommendation_id DESC;
SELECT location_name, recommendation_description FROM location_data JOIN recommendation ON location_data.location_id = recommendation.location_id WHERE recommendation_type = 'Activity';
SELECT * FROM recommendation WHERE recommendation_type = 'Sightseeing' AND location_id IN (SELECT location_id FROM location_data WHERE location_name = 'Paris');
SELECT MAX(latitude) AS max_latitude, MIN(longitude) AS min_longitude FROM location_data;
SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations;
SELECT restaurant_name, cuisine_type FROM restaurants;
SELECT activity_name, activity_type FROM activities;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE latitude > 30.0 AND longitude < -80.0;
SELECT restaurant_name, cuisine_type FROM restaurants WHERE cuisine_type = 'Italian';
SELECT activity_name, location_name FROM activities JOIN locations ON activities.location_id = locations.location_id;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE location_name LIKE 'New%';
SELECT restaurant_name, cuisine_type FROM restaurants ORDER BY cuisine_type ASC;
SELECT name, location, cuisine_type FROM Restaurants;
SELECT * FROM Restaurants WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT name, nationality, age FROM Tourists ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT name, location, category FROM Activities WHERE category = 'Outdoor';
SELECT * FROM Recommendations WHERE recommendation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Restaurants WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, location FROM Restaurants WHERE cuisine_type = 'Italian' ORDER BY name ASC;

SELECT r.name AS restaurant_name, a.name AS activity_name FROM Restaurants r JOIN Recommendations rec ON r.id = rec.restaurant_id JOIN Activities a ON a.id = rec.activity_id WHERE rec.recommendation_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT t.name, t.nationality, r.name AS restaurant_name, a.name AS activity_name FROM Tourists t JOIN Recommendations rec ON t.id = rec.tourist_id JOIN Restaurants r ON r.id = rec.restaurant_id JOIN Activities a ON a.id = rec.activity_id WHERE t.age > 25 ORDER BY t.name ASC;

SELECT r.location AS restaurant_location, AVG(t.age) AS avg_age FROM Restaurants r JOIN Recommendations rec ON r.id = rec.restaurant_id JOIN Tourists t ON t.id = rec.tourist_id GROUP BY r.location HAVING COUNT(t.id) > 10;
SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT restaurant_id, name, cuisine, rating FROM restaurants WHERE cuisine = 'Italian';
SELECT activity_id, name, category, duration FROM activities ORDER BY duration DESC;
SELECT tourist_id, name, country, age FROM tourists WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT name, cuisine, rating FROM restaurants WHERE rating > 4.5 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT activity_id, name, category, duration FROM activities WHERE duration <= 60;
SELECT location_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM reviews GROUP BY location_id HAVING avg_rating > 4;
SELECT tourist_id, name, country, age FROM tourists ORDER BY age ASC, name DESC;
